name: THE SARA
briefDescription: ‘THE – SARA’ is Jammu & Kashmir based Registered Non-Profit Organization working on Suicide Prevention & Crisis Support.‘THE – SARA’ is Registered under the Societies Registration Act, VI of 1998 (1941A.D) Registration Certificate No.JRS-690 of 2012 issued under No.JRS-690/280 dated 21.08.2012 MISSION OF THE ORGANIZATION1.  Crisis Support - services that provide immediate support to individuals at times of difficulty in their lives, and support for communities in the recovery of major events.2. Suicide Prevention - services that educate individuals and communities about suicide and offer appropriate support for those people who are at risk of Suicide or Bereaved by Suicide.3. Mental Health Support - services that provide support for people experiencing mental illness and which offer reliable information and self help resources to empower people to take steps towards maintaining mental health and emotional well-being.4. Mission Compassion - services that provide basic health care, free education, free clothing and free food through compassionate approach.
